com.iodynelabs.toffee

Class ConversationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iodynelabs.toffee.ConversationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class ConversationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Background thread to handle all network communications since Android does not allow networking on the main thread.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static interface  ConversationHandler.ConversationCallback
      Callback interface for notifying the UI thread of any messages.
      private class  ConversationHandler.MessageListener
      Listeners used by the bot.
